Title: Vitol agrees to supply 0.8 mtpa of LNG over 10 years to Philippines LNG
Description: Vitol has agreed to supply 0.8 mtpa of LNG to the Philippines LNG terminal in Batangas over the next 10 years, supporting the country’s growing energy needs and enhancing supply stability.
Author: CK

Title: China's LNG imports fall to their lowest level in almost five years
Description: China’s LNG imports fell to their lowest level in almost five years in February 2024, with this marking a second consecutive month of declining imports after December, the second-highest LNG import volume for China last year.
Author: CK

Title: US LNG exports dip in February; shipments to Europe fall for the first time in six months
Description: US LNG exports edged lower in February, with shipments to Europe falling for the first time in six months, while exports to Asia and Latin America saw modest gains.
Author: CK

Title: Snam completes purchase of Edison Stoccaggio, expanding its gas storage capacity
Description: Italy’s gas transport operator Snam has completed its acquisition of Edison Stoccaggio, strengthening its position in gas storage and boosting its total capacity to about 18 billion m3, including 4.5 billion m3 of strategic reserve. This represents more than 17% of European gas storage capacity, reinforcing Snam’s role in ensuring energy security for Italy and Europe.
Author: CK
